name: Someone Like You Online Trivia | People | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the identical twin brothers who were regulars on the country music television show "Hee-Haw" from 1969 until 1986?
questions.explanation:
The Hager Twins.

	Jim and John Hager were identical twin brothers who made a career in country music and comedy. They recorded six albums and performed with country music greats like Kenny Rogers and Merle Haggard. They were featured in the second issue of "Playgirl" in 1973, and guest starred on many television shows.

questions.text: Which actress starred in the block-buster movie "The Terminator" (1984) and has an identical twin that did a couple of body double scenes in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Linda Hamilton.

	Linda Hamilton (b. 1956) is an American actress who is best known for her role as the character Sarah Conner is the blockbuster movie "The Terminator" and its sequel "Terminator 2: Judgment Day" (1991). Her identical twin sister Leslie Hamilton Gearren is a nurse, but did appear in three different scenes in the first movie as Linda's double.

questions.text: Identical twins Ronde and Tiki Barber became famous for playing which of these sports?
questions.explanation:
Football (American).

	These two brothers were born on April 7, 1975 in Roanoke, Virginia. Both went on to have stellar careers in the NFL. Tiki Barber played the running back position for the New York Giants for 10 years before retiring. Identical twin brother Ronde played cornerback for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers for over 15 years. Both brothers were selected for multiple Pro-Bowls and were famous for their balance and quick moves.

questions.text: The images of identical twin sisters Esther Pauline Friedman and Pauline Esther Friedman were seen by millions of people every day for over 50 years as they became famous for their work in which field?
options: They were the first twins in outer space
They were renowned Hollywood costume designers
questions.explanation:
They were newspaper advice columnists.

	Esther Pauline Friedman and Pauline Esther Friedman are better known to most Americans as Dear Abby, and Anne Landers. For over 50 years these sisters published advice columns in most of Americas largest papers. Born in July of 1918, these two twins whose likeness was seen by millions every day, were very private women who escaped the prowling paparazzi.

questions.text: Which one of these lovely actresses has an identical twin sister?
questions.explanation:
Jill Hennessy.

	Canadian actress Jill Hennessy is best known for her roles on the television programs "Law & Order" (1993-1996) and "Crossing Jordon" (2001-2007). This lovely actress has an identical twin sister named Jacqueline who is a Canadian journalist, television host, and occasional actress. In a 1996 episode of Law & Order called "Corpus Delicti" twin sister Jacqueline played some of the courtroom scene when sister Jill was unavailable.

questions.text: Jaroslaw and Lech Kaczynski are identical twins who were the President and Prime Minister of which country at the same time?
questions.explanation:
Poland.

	Lech Kaczynski was the third president of Poland, from 2005-2010. His identical twin brother Jaroslaw Kaczynski was in office at the same time as the 13th Prime Minister of Poland. When these two were children they appeared in the 1962 Polish film "The Two Who Stole the Moon". As adults they both had very successful political careers and were considered to be at the forefront of Polish politics.

questions.text: While you may know that Elvis Aron Presley had a great singing and acting career, what did his identical twin brother Jesse Garon Presley do for a living?
options: He was a Marine that died in the Vietnamese War
questions.explanation:
Nothing, he was stillborn.

	Elvis' identical twin Jesse Garon was stillborn, and Elvis basically grew up as an only child. He did have three much younger step-brothers who looked up to him as a father figure. As for the spelling of Elvis's middle name it was originally Aron and was changed later to the more common spelling of Aaron. Could the world have handled two men with the looks and talent of the man known as "The King"?

questions.text: Fabio da Silva and Rafael da Silva are identical twins that both play professional soccer and were born and raised in which of these countries?
questions.explanation:
Brazil.

	Fabio and Rafael were born in Petropolis, Brazil, about an hour away from Rio de Janeiro in 1990. Both brothers were signed by Manchester United of the Premier League in 2007. Their skillful playing draws huge crowds and they have a very large fan club.

questions.text: American actor Ashton Kutcher has an identical twin brother named Aaron.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ashton Kutcher does have a twin, but his name is not Aaron and they are not identical twins. Michael has cerebral palsy and severe cardiac issues. These fraternal twins are close and there is a slight resemblance. While Ashton is busy with his Hollywood career, Michael is very busy as an advocate for those with cerebral palsy. Very politically active, he advocates for more money for the treatment, study and possible cure for this all too common disorder.

questions.text: Which author of "On Death and Dying" (1969) has both an identical twin and a fraternal twin?
questions.explanation:
Dr. Elizabeth Kübler Ross

	Dr. Elizabeth Kübler-Ross was born in 1926 in Zürich, Switzerland one of a set of triplets who all survived birth. One sister, Erika, was an identical twin and the other sister Eva was fraternal. Kübler-Ross was a ground-breaking psychologist in the field of death and dying. Her "Five Stages of Grief" are recognized all over the world.These stages are denial, anger, bargaining, depression and acceptance. These reactions to death or dying are almost universally observed in those people who are dying or dealing with the death of a loved one. These stages can be experienced in different orders by different people.
